    • Constructor Detail

      • Anchor

        public Anchor(float width,
              float height)
        Creates a new spinner at the origin. The size is expressed in physics units NOT pixels. In order for drawing to work properly, you MUST set the drawScale. The drawScale converts the physics units to pixels.
        Parameters:
        width - The object width in physics units
        height - The object width in physics units

      • Anchor

        public Anchor(float x,
              float y,
              float width,
              float height)
        Creates a new spinner at the given position. The size is expressed in physics units NOT pixels. In order for drawing to work properly, you MUST set the drawScale. The drawScale converts the physics units to pixels.
        Parameters:
        x - Initial x position of the avatar center
        y - Initial y position of the avatar center
        width - The object width in physics units
        height - The object width in physics units

      • Anchor

        public Anchor(float x,
              float y,
              com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.g2d.TextureRegion texture,
              com.badlogic.gdx.math.Vector2 scale)
        Create a new anchor at (x,y) with the given texture and draw scale.
        Parameters:
        x - X coord of the new anchor
        y - Y coord of the new anchor
        texture - Texture for the new anchor
        scale - Draw scale for the new anchor

    • Method Detail

      • fromJSON

        public static Anchor fromJSON(com.badlogic.gdx.utils.JsonValue json,
                              com.badlogic.gdx.math.Vector2 scale)
        Return a new anchor with parameters specified by the JSON
        Parameters:
        json - A JSON containing data for one anchor
        scale - The scale to convert physics units to drawing units
        Returns:
        A star created according to the specifications in the JSON
